about_the_game:
[/url] PROĆEMON is a retro-style procedurally generated monster collecting game. Everything is a glitch, all the time. [img][/img] Every monster is procedurally generated and totally unique. All sprites, stats, flavor text, and attack moves are totally random. [img][/img] Fuse two Proćemon to make a new powerful Proćemon! [img][/img] [img][/img] Use the [b]Procedural Generator[/b] to journey to new worlds. [img][/img] [b]Battle enemies[/b] to level up your Proćemon or [b]charm enemies[/b] into joining your team. Every move, animation, sound, and special effect is procedurally generated. [img][/img] Earn [b]badges [/b] by defeating the [b]Shareholders[/b] of the evil [b]Infinity Corporation[/b]. [img][/img

PROĆEMON is a retro-style procedurally generated monster collecting game. Everything is a glitch, all the time.



Every monster is procedurally generated and totally unique. All sprites, stats, flavor text, and attack moves are totally random.



Fuse two Proćemon to make a new powerful Proćemon!





Use the Procedural Generator to journey to new worlds.



Battle enemies to level up your Proćemon or charm enemies into joining your team. Every move, animation, sound, and special effect is procedurally generated.



Earn badges by defeating the Shareholders of the evil Infinity Corporation.

Every move, animation, sound, and special effect is procedurally generated. [img][/img] Earn [b]badges [/b] by defeating the [b]Shareholders[/b] of the evil [b]Infinity Corporation[/b]. [img][/img

PROĆEMON is a retro-style procedurally generated monster collecting game. Everything is a glitch, all the time.



Every monster is procedurally generated and totally unique. All sprites, stats, flavor text, and attack moves are totally random.



Fuse two Proćemon to make a new powerful Proćemon!





Use the Procedural Generator to journey to new worlds.



Battle enemies to level up your Proćemon or charm enemies into joining your team. Every move, animation, sound, and special effect is procedurally generated.



Earn badges by defeating the Shareholders of the evil Infinity Corporation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18 or 20
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18 or 20
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
